name: Nourriture Rapide
description:
This project was made in 48 hours by college students from the team 14 "Honoladro" during the McGame Jam 2021.

We are very pleased to present you "Nourriture Rapide", a beat them-all survival taking place in a French kitchen against evil vegetables.

How to play:

-WSAD / Arrow keys to move

-E / CTRL to interact

-Left click to attack

-Right click to use the special attack

Fight the vegetables and save your kitchen before the time runs out.

You have at your disposal different weapons. Your knife which you have from the start. Weapons that you can find in the level like a cleaver which you can spin with and touch the enemies all around you. A bottle of champagne which you can use to shoot with. And a broom to … hum … wipe the floor, I guess? You can only carry one of the three weapons in the map at once.

Close all the kitchen cabinets to slow down the invasion. Be careful, that does not mean it will stop them for long.

You will fight 3 kinds of vegetables, carrots, eggplants and potatoes. The carrots are the fastest. The eggplants hit harder and the potatoes are the toughest.

Credits:

-Game Design: Gaëtan P., Marine S. and Jeffrey Z.

-Level Design: Jeffrey Z.

-Coding: Gaëtan P.

-In-game Art: Marin S.

-Pixel Art: Jeffrey Z.

-Main game sound:  The music was made by the author "Spring" that you can find here: https://opengameart.org/content/the-accordion-sample. Title: Accordion Sample 2. Is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)
